name: YUMPR
description:
Get involved in this 2-D pixel platform game that will make you experience fun, stress, success, anger, and FUN. Adapt or Die, improve your in game mechanics to be able to succeed this adventure, which be sure is going to become harder as you keep advancing.

Soundtrack

More than 15 minutes of music that you can enjoy while playing, don't worry about repetitive music, there are more than 30 songs with around 30 seconds of duration.

Control

Move YUMPR at your will with your keyboard or Xbox Controller.

Variety of enemies and obstacles

Have fun avoiding unique enemies and obstacles, learn the jumping mechanics, improve your skills to advance the journey.

Difficulty

Start with easy levels, see how they get tougher until you reach a point where you need to master the game, giving it replayability when trying to complete all the achievements.
